oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Seeking tetrameric transition metal phosphonate with a D4R core and organising it into a 3-D supramolecular assembly
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MURUGAVEL, R
SHANMUGAN, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: pyrazole ligands
tetranuclear
aluminophosphonate
transformations
phosphates
elements
cluster
cages
units
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The first cubic zinc phosphonate [tBuPO(3)Zn(2-apy)] 4 (1) whose core resembles the D4R SBU of zeolites, has been synthesised from a reaction between zinc acetate, tert- butylphosphonic acid and 2- aminopyridine at room temperature; the X- ray structure determination reveals that the molecules of 1, which crystallise in the tetragonal I4(1)/a space group with crystallographically imposed 4 symmetry, form a 3-D supramolecular assembly aided by N-(HO)-O-... hydrogen bonding.
